statements: SELECT * FROM blackmail_material;
SELECT target_name, information_collected FROM blackmail_material ORDER BY target_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM blackmail_material WHERE id = 3;
SELECT target_name, coercion_method FROM blackmail_material WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, coercion_method FROM blackmail_material ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM blackmail_material WHERE coercion_method = 'Threatening' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT target_name, coercion_method FROM blackmail_material WHERE target_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT information_collected FROM blackmail_material WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT id, target_name, coercion_method FROM blackmail_material WHERE coercion_method = 'Bribery' ORDER BY target_name ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, target_name, timestamp FROM blackmail_material WHERE information_collected IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM blackmail_targets;
SELECT target_name, target_email FROM blackmail_targets WHERE target_id = 1;
SELECT blackmail_info, target_name FROM blackmail_targets ORDER BY target_id DESC;
SELECT target_name, record_details FROM blackmail_targets t JOIN blackmail_records r ON t.target_id = r.target_id;
SELECT target_name, record_date FROM blackmail_targets t JOIN blackmail_records r ON t.target_id = r.target_id WHERE record_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM blackmail_targets WHERE target_id = 1
SELECT target_name, target_email FROM blackmail_targets WHERE target_id IN (2, 3, 4)
SELECT * FROM blackmail_targets ORDER BY target_name DESC
SELECT target_name, COUNT(*) AS record_count FROM blackmail_targets JOIN blackmail_records ON blackmail_targets.target_id = blackmail_records.target_id GROUP BY target_name HAVING record_count > 2
SELECT blackmail_info FROM blackmail_targets WHERE target_email LIKE '%@example.com%'
SELECT * FROM blackmail_info;
SELECT target_name, compromising_photo FROM blackmail_info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, target_name FROM blackmail_videos ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM blackmail_info WHERE target_name = 'Alice';
SELECT target_name, record FROM blackmail_records LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM blackmail_info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT target_name, compromising_photo FROM blackmail_info WHERE target_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM blackmail_videos ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT target_name, video FROM blackmail_videos WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT target_name, record FROM blackmail_records WHERE record LIKE '%scandal%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM blackmail_targets;
SELECT target_name, compromising_info FROM blackmail_targets WHERE target_id = 1;
SELECT blackmailer_id, blackmailer_name, risk_level FROM blackmailer ORDER BY risk_level DESC;
SELECT target_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM blackmail_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, event_description FROM blackmail_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM blackmail_targets ORDER BY target_name ASC;
SELECT target_name, compromising_info FROM blackmail_targets WHERE blackmailer_id = 1;
SELECT blackmailer_name, risk_level FROM blackmailer WHERE risk_level > 5 ORDER BY risk_level DESC;

SELECT target_name, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM blackmail_targets JOIN blackmail_transactions ON blackmail_targets.target_id = blackmail_transactions.target_id WHERE transaction_amount > 500;
SELECT log_timestamp, event_description FROM blackmail_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM blackmail_targets;
SELECT name, email FROM blackmail_targets WHERE target_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM compromising_info ORDER BY info_id DESC;
SELECT target_id, COUNT(*) AS num_threats FROM threats GROUP BY target_id;
SELECT name, compliance_status FROM blackmail_targets JOIN compliance_records ON blackmail_targets.target_id = compliance_records.target_id;
SELECT * FROM blackmail_targets ORDER BY name DESC, target_id ASC;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM blackmail_targets WHERE target_id = 1;
SELECT threats.threat_message, blackmail_targets.name FROM threats JOIN blackmail_targets ON threats.target_id = blackmail_targets.target_id WHERE threats.target_id = 3;

SELECT blackmailers.name, blackmailers.organization, compromising_info.data FROM blackmailers JOIN compromising_info ON blackmailers.blackmailer_id = compromising_info.info_id WHERE compromising_info.info_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY record_id ASC;
